comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:
CWGC has this:

ABBOTT, JAMES LAWRENCE

Rank: Sapper
Service No: 2461
Date of Death: 23/07/1916
Age: 19
Regiment/Service: Australian Engineers 2nd Field Coy.
Panel Reference  
Memorial VILLERS-BRETONNEUX MEMORIAL
Additional Information:
Son of Henry Richard and Catherine Isobel Abbott, of 14, Orchard St., Brighton, Victoria.

comment.author: 10758109@N04
comment._content:
:(((( horrendously sad.  A lost generation occurs in every war.

My great grand mother who died in 1961 before i was born, apparently used to say with the birth of boys in the family
"the next bullet for a war" 

Thanks for sharing.

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: War diary of 2nd Field Company has been digitised and can be found here www.awm.gov.au/collection/records/awm4/14/21/awm4-14-21-1...
